name: Batoni
summary: Batoni is a top down adventure in the strange town of Mixito. You'll Role play as the "special agent". The agency sends you, to adventure and get to the bottom of what's happening in Mixito! And stop it, by any means necessary. In this dark eerie-puzzle adventure game you'll talk with citizens and try to solve the puzzle. Gather the right tools for the job and solve quirky puzzles.
